long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grow Your Business with WA Sender! 

✨ Send Messages Fast and Easy: Contact your customers on WhatsApp and grow your business with less effort.

💡 What It Can Do
✅ Send messages to users
✅ Send messages to group members
✅ Send messages to label members
✅ Send pictures, videos, documents, and vCards
✅ Delete sent messages automatically
✅ Choose how long to wait between messages

⚙️ How to Use
1. Open the plugin
2. Add the phone numbers and your message
3.Click “Send” and let it work for you

🔒 Your Privacy Is Safe
Your data stays on your computer. It never goes through our servers, so only you can see it.

🔥 Try it now! Install WA Sender and grow your business today!
